title: 有什么插件能让护甲穿上去能增加血量上限的插件？
author: 毁灭者
txt_content: 有什么插件能让护甲穿上去能增加血量上限的插件？急用！

replies.author: wen901045
replies.txt_content:
Itemizer加上Lore Attributes一起用就可以了
Itemizer http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-172642-1-1.html
Lore Attributes  http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-177171-1-1.html

replies.author: wen901045
replies.txt_content:
不过要让血的心多还要加上More Hearts
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-153588-1-1.html
